articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Untitled
articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

            Bio
            YifanYue grew up in Shanghai,China.
            
            
            Education
            China Agriculture University | Beijing
            M.S. in Pesticides | September 2021 - Now
            China Agriculture University | Beijing
            B.S. in Applied Chemistry | September 2017 - July 2021
            
            
            Experience
            I have learned python, R and C++ through some videos on Bilibili, Youtube and Github. This is a website made by myself in R package ‚Äúdistill‚Äù. I do some research on metabolomics and am looking forward to a Doctoral Admission. But I have no offer now.üò¢ Now I am preparing for Toefl and GRE so I am a bit busy.üòÄ
